snippet: Data released Monday underlined just how rapidly the overall economy has been cooling, but retail sales grew 13.6 percent in December.
lead_paragraph: Data released Monday underlined just how rapidly the overall economy has been cooling, but retail sales grew 13.6 percent in December.

headline.main: For China, a Shift From Exports to Consumption
headline.print_headline: For China, a Shift From Exports to Consumption
